title: Good thing they’re trained not to abuse children
author: VD
content_html:
Yes, this is why we have to make sure there is government oversight of homeschooling. Because obviously it’s much better to have them taught by people trained not to abuse them:

Seven members of the North American Man/Boy Love Association, including two teachers, were arrested in Southern California and charged with allegedly planning to travel to Mexico to have sex with boys, authorities said….

The seven arrested included: Steven K. Irvin, 46, of Pittsburgh, a special education teacher at Carrick High School (search); Richard Stutsman, 59, of Seneca, S.C., a substitute teacher for a school district in Oconee County;

I wonder how many boys those two men have abused over the 50-plus years they’ve been teaching?
